data.name: Near the Fear
data.detailed_description:
EMBRACE THE FAILURE AND BECOME STRONGER FOR IT

Drive to survive on ever-changing (procedurally-generated) tracks with everything trying to stop you. Failing is progress. Every time you fail you move closer to your goals.



FACE YOUR FEARS (OR DON'T)

Use special powers to overcome ever-present danger. Will you CLEAR your mind of corruption or try to AVOID any threat?



WORLD BALANCE MECHANIC

The way you play the game, shapes the world around you. The game is build around two different playstyles - exposure vs. avoidance. Each approach has its own pros and cons and changes tracks, environments and access to upgrades, thus creating different mood of the game.


For example, when you’re using avoidance abilities, you get access to upgrades which break the rules of the game (something like cheats), but are only temporary. On the other hand, when you’re using exposure abilities, you’ll get upgrades that support your endeavors and are permanent.

Features

  • unique combination of racing genre and roguelite gameplay loop
  • gameplay mechanics that reflect real-world techniques of dealing with fear (exposure vs. avoidance)
  • unique „World Balance“ mechanic that changes tracks, environments and access to upgrades
  • surreal setting with dreamy landscapes and nightmarish depictions
  • driving on the edge where every input matters

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1927200/Near_the_Fear/
